mapper.select: SELECT CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , SDING_INFO /* 상품명 */ , ADR /* 배송주소 */ , VST_DT /* 배송예정일 */ , (CASE WHEN VST_DT > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN '배송준비중' WHEN WK_DT IS NOT NULL THEN '배송완료' WHEN SPP_CNFMDT IS NOT NULL THEN '배송중' ELSE '' END ) DLVY_STATUS /* 배송상태 */ , SELL_AMT /* 금액(월) */ FROM ( SELECT F1.CNTR_NO , F1.CNTR_SN /* , F2.SDING_PD_CD */ /* , F2.SDING_SN */ /* , F2.SDING_QTY */ /* , P1.PD_NM */ , F1.WK_DT WK_DT , NVL(F1.WK_DT, F1.VST_DUEDT) VST_DT /* , F3.SDING_PKG_PD_CD */ , F3.SPP_CNFMDT , S1.IST_ADR || ' ' || S1.IST_DTL_ADR AS ADR , F3.SDING_PKG_PD_CD , LISTAGG(P1.PD_NM||' '||F2.SDING_QTY, ' / ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY F2.SDING_SN) AS SDING_INFO FROM TB_SVPD_SDING_SPP_PLAN_IZ F1 /* 모종배송계획내역 FA101 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_SDING_SPP_EXP_IZ F2 /* 모종배송예정내역 FA102 */ ON F1.CNTR_NO = F2.CNTR_NO AND F1.CNTR_SN = F2.CNTR_SN AND F1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = F2.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD AND F1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = F2.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD AND F1.SPP_ORD_NO = F2.SPP_ORD_NO AND F1.SPP_PLAN_SN = F2.SPP_PLAN_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON F2.SDING_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ S1 /* 고객서비스AS설치대상내역 AC211 */ ON F1.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND F1.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN AND F1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = S1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD AND F1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = S1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD AND SUBSTR(S1.AS_IST_OJ_NO, 2) = SUBSTR(F1.SPP_ORD_NO,1,9)||LPAD(SUBSTR(F1.SPP_ORD_NO, 10),8,'0') /* INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS A1 */ /* 계약주소지기본 LD30 */ /* ON S1.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = A1.CNTR_ADRPC_ID */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_SDING_SPP_CNFM_IZ F3 /* 모종배송확정내역 FA103 */ ON F1.CNTR_NO = F3.CNTR_NO AND F1.CNTR_SN = F3.CNTR_SN AND F1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = F3.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD AND F1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = F3.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD AND F1.SPP_ORD_NO = F3.SPP_ORD_NO AND F1.SPP_PLAN_SN = F3.SPP_PLAN_SN WHERE P1.PD_CLSF_ID NOT IN ('PDC000000001839') /* 배양액, POT 제외 */ AND F1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '1' AND F1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD LIKE '11%' GROUP BY F1.CNTR_NO , F1.CNTR_SN , F1.WK_DT , NVL(F1.WK_DT, F1.VST_DUEDT) , F3.SPP_CNFMDT , F3.SDING_PKG_PD_CD , S1.IST_ADR || ' ' || S1.IST_DTL_ADR UNION ALL SELECT CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , WK_DT , VST_DT , SPP_CNFMDT , ADR , SDING_PKG_PD_CD , ( CASE WHEN SDING_PD_CLSF_ID1 NOT IN ('PDC000000001839') THEN SDING_PD_NM1 ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN SDING_PD_CLSF_ID2 NOT IN ('PDC000000001839') THEN SDING_PD_NM2 ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN SDING_PD_CLSF_ID3 NOT IN ('PDC000000001839') THEN SDING_PD_NM3 ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN SDING_PD_CLSF_ID4 NOT IN ('PDC000000001839') THEN SDING_PD_NM4 ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN SDING_PD_CLSF_ID5 NOT IN ('PDC000000001839') THEN SDING_PD_NM5 ELSE '' END ) AS SDING_INFO FROM (SELECT S2.CNTR_NO , S2.CNTR_SN , F4.SDING_PD_CD1 , F4.SDING_QTY1 , (SELECT PD_CLSF_ID FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE F4.SDING_PD_CD1 = TB_PDBS_PD_BAS.PD_CD) SDING_PD_CLSF_ID1 , (SELECT PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE F4.SDING_PD_CD1 = TB_PDBS_PD_BAS.PD_CD) SDING_PD_NM1 , F4.SDING_PD_CD2 , F4.SDING_QTY2 , (SELECT PD_CLSF_ID FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE F4.SDING_PD_CD2 = TB_PDBS_PD_BAS.PD_CD) SDING_PD_CLSF_ID2 , (SELECT PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE F4.SDING_PD_CD2 = TB_PDBS_PD_BAS.PD_CD) SDING_PD_NM2 , F4.SDING_PD_CD3 , F4.SDING_QTY3 , (SELECT PD_CLSF_ID FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE F4.SDING_PD_CD3 = TB_PDBS_PD_BAS.PD_CD) SDING_PD_CLSF_ID3 , (SELECT PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE F4.SDING_PD_CD3 = TB_PDBS_PD_BAS.PD_CD) SDING_PD_NM3 , F4.SDING_PD_CD4 , F4.SDING_QTY4 , (SELECT PD_CLSF_ID FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE F4.SDING_PD_CD4 = TB_PDBS_PD_BAS.PD_CD) SDING_PD_CLSF_ID4 , (SELECT PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE F4.SDING_PD_CD4 = TB_PDBS_PD_BAS.PD_CD) SDING_PD_NM4 , F4.SDING_PD_CD5 , F4.SDING_QTY5 , (SELECT PD_CLSF_ID FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE F4.SDING_PD_CD5 = TB_PDBS_PD_BAS.PD_CD) SDING_PD_CLSF_ID5 , (SELECT PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE F4.SDING_PD_CD5 = TB_PDBS_PD_BAS.PD_CD) SDING_PD_NM5 , F4.ADR , NVL(S2.WK_DT, S2.VST_DUEDT) VST_DT , F4.SPP_CNFMDT , S2.WK_DT , SDING_PKG_PD_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ S2 /* 고객서비스정기BS주기내역 VS107 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T1.* , T5.RNADR ||' '|| T5.RDADR AS ADR FROM TB_SVPD_SDING_SPP_CNFM_IZ T1 INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T3 /*계약주소관계*/ ON T1.CNTR_NO = T3.DTL_CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T3.DTL_CNTR_SN /* AND T3.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' */ /*1 계약주소, 2 배달주소, 3 설치주소*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T3.VL_STRT_DTM AND T3.VL_END_DTM AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T4 /*계약주소지기본*/ ON T3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID /*계약주소지ID*/ AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN GBSDBS.TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS T5 ON T4.ADR_ID = T5.ADR_ID /*이해욱이사님,이진성프로님과 협의 설치, AS는 배정시에 주소를 사용 해야 하기 때문에 TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ 에 ADR_ID 를 추가 하기로 함. 테이블이 변경 되면, T4.ADR_ID 를 T1.ADR_ID 으로 수정 해야 함*/ AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) F4 ON S2.CNTR_NO = F4.CNTR_NO AND S2.CNTR_SN = F4.CNTR_SN AND S2.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = F4.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD AND F4.SPP_ORD_NO = '2'||S2.VST_DUEDT||LPAD(S2.IST_NMN_N,5,'0') WHERE S2.VST_DUEDT <= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 3),'YYYYMMDD') ) MAIN2 ) MAIN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_SDING_PRC_BAS P2 ON MAIN.VST_DT BETWEEN P2.APY_STRTDT AND P2.APY_ENDDT AND MAIN.SDING_PKG_PD_CD = P2.PDCT_PD_CD WHERE CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}
